cover.place: De Mer Wedding Hall, Gwangju, South Korea

letter.sub_title: You're warmly invited to our wedding celebration.
letter.letter_content:
Every moment we've shared with you has filled our lives with joy and warmth.
Now, as we begin a new journey together, it would mean the world to us to have you by our side.
Your presence, blessings, and warm wishes will make our special day even more meaningful.
We look forward to celebrating with you!
